original_text: David said to King Achish, ‘What have I done that is wrong? You say that you have found nothing wrong with me all the time that I have been with you. You are my master and king. So why should I not go with you to fight your enemies?’ David said to King Achish, ‘What have I done that is wrong? You say that you have found nothing wrong with me all the time that I have been with you. You are my master and king. So why should I not go with you to fight your enemies?’
korean_text: 다윗이 아기스에게 이르되 내가 무엇을 하였나이까 내가 당신 앞에 오늘까지 있는 동안에 당신이 종에게서 무엇을 보셨기에 내가 가서 내 주 왕의 원수와 싸우지 못하게 하시나이까 하니

sentences.original_text: What have I done that is wrong?
You say that you have found nothing wrong with me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내게서 아무 잘못도 찾지 못했다고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: all the time that I have been with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신과 함께 있던 모든 시간 동안

sentences.original_text: You are my master and king
So why should I not go with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 내가 당신과 함께 가지 않아야 할 이유가 무엇입니까
